note.p: Born in Stanhope, County Durham, daughter of Cuthbert Bainbridge and Mary Muschamp. Married William Fenwick on 12 January 1824. Mother of John George Fenwick.
Select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 25 July 2014)
marriage register of Stanhope, county Durham (genuki.cs.ncl.ac.uk/Transcriptions/DUR/STP1800.html, accessed 25 July 2014)
